explanation: Agent A is correct. Given the provided definition #define LFS_LOCK(cfg) ((void)cfg,0), the assignment err = LFS_LOCK(lfs->cfg) always yields the constant 0, so the controlling expression if (err) is invariant (always false). MISRA C 2023 Rule 14.3 prohibits invariant controlling expressions, and none of the listed exceptions (infinite-loop invariants or the permitted do-while constant-false pattern) apply to this plain if-statement. Therefore the report of a Rule 14.3 violation is valid for the code as shown (unless LFS_LOCK is conditionally redefined elsewhere to yield a non-constant value).
